https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5KVPsQue77aCd8Eu9OGZeLk5rm1.jpg Strong Puerto Rican women forced to flee the island after Hurricane Maria have bonded like family in a FEMA hotel in the Bronx. They seek stability in their new life as forces try to pull them apart. After Maria
